title: Angelic Layer
resume: 12-year-old Misaki Suzuhara has just gotten involved in Angelic  Layer, a battling game using electronic dolls called angels. Even as a  newbie, Misaki shows advanced skills as she meets new friends and enters  Angelic Layer tournaments to fight the greatest Angelic Layer champions  of the nation.
